articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Credit Suisse slump renews fears of global banking crisis - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Shares of Swiss bank lose more than a quarter of their value in one day, dragging down European and US markets.
articles.content: Shares in Credit Suisse have plunged and dragged down other major European lenders as fears about deeper problems in the world banking system have spread in the wake of bank failures in the United St… [+3445 chars]
